<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.1</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES,&nbsp;INC.</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2000 STOCK PLAN</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Adopted by the Board of Directors and Stockholders on June&nbsp;9, 2000</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Amended by the Board of Directors on October&nbsp;25, 2000 and</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">July&nbsp;31, 2001 and</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Approved by the Stockholders on May&nbsp;1, 2002 and</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Further amended by the Board of Directors on December&nbsp;18, 2003, May&nbsp;12, 2005,</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;June&nbsp;23, 2005 and November&nbsp;13, 2014</font></i></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PURPOSE AND ADOPTION OF THE PLAN</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">1.01 Purpose.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The purpose of the Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc. 2000 Stock Plan (hereinafter referred to as the &#147;Plan&#148;) is to assist in attracting and retaining highly competent employees, directors and consultants and to act as an incentive in motivating selected employees, directors and consultants of Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc. and its Subsidiaries (as defined below) to achieve long-term corporate objectives.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">1.02 Adoption and Term.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Plan has been approved by the Board of Directors of Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc. and its stockholders to be effective as of July&nbsp;14, 2000 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;).&#160; The Plan terminated on May&nbsp;1, 2012 (the 10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;anniversary of the last shareholder approval of the Plan), but remains in effect for the purposes of governing the Awards granted under the Plan prior to such date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;II</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the purposes of this Plan, capitalized terms shall have the following meanings:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.01 Award</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means any grant to a Participant of one or a combination of Non-Qualified Stock Options or Incentive Stock Options described in Article&nbsp;VI, Stock Appreciation Rights described in Article&nbsp;VI, Restricted Shares or Restricted Stock Units described in Article&nbsp;VII and Performance Awards described in Article&nbsp;VIII.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.02 Award Agreement</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a written agreement between the Company and a Participant or a written notice from the Company to a Participant specifically setting forth the terms and conditions of an Award granted under the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.03 Award Period</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means, with respect to an Award, the period of time set forth in the Award Agreement during which specified target performance goals must be achieved or other</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=1022456,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">conditions set forth in the Award Agreement must be satisfied.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.04 Beneficiary</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means an individual, trust or estate who or which, by a written designation of the Participant filed with the Company or by operation of law, succeeds to the rights and obligations of the Participant under the Plan and an Award Agreement upon the Participant&#146;s death.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.05 Board</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.06 Change in Control</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means, and shall be deemed to have occurred upon the occurrence of any one of the following events:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The acquisition by any individual, entity or group (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;13(d)(3)&nbsp;or 14(d)(2)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#147;Exchange Act&#148;)) (a &#147;Person&#148;) of beneficial ownership (within the meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act) of 25% or more of either (i)&nbsp;the then outstanding shares of common stock of the Company (the &#147;Outstanding Company Common Stock&#148;) or (ii)&nbsp;the combined voting power of the then outstanding voting securities of the Company entitled to vote generally in the election of directors (the &#147;Outstanding Company Voting Securities&#148;); provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions shall not constitute a Change of Control:&#160; (i)&nbsp;any acquisition directly from the Company, (ii)&nbsp;any acquisition by the Company, or (iii)&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by the Company or any corporation controlled by the Company; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Individuals who, as of the date hereof, constitute the Board (the &#147;Incumbent Board&#148;) cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of the Board; provided, however, that any individual becoming a director subsequent to the date hereof whose election, or nomination for election by the Company&#146;s shareholders, was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the directors then comprising the Incumbent Board shall be considered as though such individual were a member of the Incumbent Board, but excluding, for this purpose, any such individual whose initial assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election contest with respect to the election or removal of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Board; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consummation by the Company of a reorganization, merger or consolidation or sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company or the acquisition of assets of another corporation (a &#147;Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Business Combination, (i)&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who were the beneficial owners, respectively, of the Outstanding Company Common Stock and Outstanding Company Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, more than 75% of, respectively, the then outstanding shares of common stock and the combined voting power of the then</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_2_073523_5335"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=30767,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">outstanding voting securities entitled to vote generally in the election of directors, as the case may be, of the corporation resulting from such Business Combination (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction owns the Company or all or substantially all of the Company&#146;s assets either directly or through one or more subsidiaries) in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination of the Outstanding Company Common Stock and Outstanding Company Voting Securities, as the case may be, (ii)&nbsp;no Person (excluding any employee benefit plan (or related trust) of the Company or such corporation resulting from such Business Combination) beneficially owns, directly or indirectly, 25% or more of, respectively, the then outstanding shares of common stock of the corporation resulting from such Business Combination or the combined voting power of the then outstanding voting securities of such corporation except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination and (iii)&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of the corporation resulting from such Business Combination were members of the Incumbent Board at the time of the execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Board, providing for such Business Combination; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Approval by the shareholders of the Company of a complete liquidation or dissolution of the Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.07 Code</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.&#160; References to a section of the Code include that section and any comparable section or sections of any future legislation that amends, supplements or supersedes said section.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.08 Company</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation, and its successors.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.09 Common Stock</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means Common Stock of the Company, par value $0.001 per share.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.10 Company Voting Securities</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the combined voting power of all outstanding securities of the Company entitled to vote generally in the election of directors of the Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.11 Date of Grant</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the date designated by the Board as the date as of which it grants an Award, which shall not be earlier than the date on which the Board approves the granting of such Award.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.12 Disability </font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">means a total and permanent disability such that, due to physical or mental illness, injury or disease, a Participant is unable to perform any services for the Company and its Subsidiaries and, in the opinion of a qualified physician designated by the Board, such disability will be permanent and continuous during the remainder of the Participant&#146;s life.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.13 Effective Date</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> shall have the meaning given to such term in Section&nbsp;1.02.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.14 Exchange Act</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_3_073551_5796"></a></font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.15 Exercise Price</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means, with respect to a Stock Appreciation Right, the amount established by the Board in the related Award Agreement as the amount to be subtracted from the Fair Market Value on the date of exercise in order to determine the amount of the payment to be made to the Participant, as further described in Section&nbsp;6.02(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.16 Fair Market Value</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means, as of any applicable date, the closing price of a share of the Common Stock on the Nasdaq National Market System (&#147;NMS&#148;) or, if not then authorized for trading on the NMS but traded on a nationally recognized exchange, the closing price of a share of the Common on such exchange or, if not then authorized or traded on any nationally recognized exchange, the fair market value of the Common Stock as determined in good faith under procedures established by the Board.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.17 Incentive Stock Option</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a stock option within the meaning of Section&nbsp;422 of the Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.18 Merger</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means any merger, reorganization, consolidation, share exchange, transfer of assets or other transaction having similar effect involving the Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.19 Non-Employee Director</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a member of the Board who is not also a common law employee of Company.&#160; A member of the Board who is a common law employee of the Company shall become a Non-Employee Director as of the date he or she ceases to be an active employee of the Company.&#160; For purposes of this Plan, a member of the Board who receives deferred compensation or benefits, whether through a qualified plan or other arrangement, will not be deemed to be an active employee of the Company solely on account of the receipt of such deferred compensation or benefits.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.20 Non-Qualified Stock Option</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a stock option which is not an Incentive Stock Option.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.21 Options</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means all Non-Qualified Stock Options and Incentive Stock Options granted at any time under the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.22 Participant</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a person designated to receive an Award under the Plan in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.01.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.23 Performance Awards</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means Awards granted in accordance with Article&nbsp;VIII.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.24 Plan</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc. 2000 Stock Plan as described herein, as the same may be amended from time to time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.25 Purchase Price</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">, with respect to Options, shall have the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;6.01(c).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.26 Restricted Shares</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means Common Stock subject to restrictions imposed in connection with Awards granted under Sections&nbsp;7.01-7.03.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_4_073619_2897"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=4,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=666732,FOLIO='4',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.27 Restricted Stock Unit</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the right granted to a Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.04 to receive shares of Common Stock (or the equivalent value in cash or other property if the Board so provides) in the future that may be subject to certain terms, conditions and restrictions.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.28 Retirement </font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">means a Participant&#146;s voluntary Termination of Employment with the consent of the Board.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.29 Stock Appreciation Rights</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means Awards granted in accordance with Article&nbsp;VI.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.30 Subsidiary</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means a subsidiary of the Company within the meaning of Section&nbsp;424(f)&nbsp;of the Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">2.31 Termination of Employment</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> means the voluntary or involuntary termination of a Participant&#146;s employment with the Company or a Subsidiary for any reason, including death, Disability, Retirement or as the result of the divestiture of the Participant&#146;s employer or any similar transaction in which the Participant&#146;s employer ceases to be the Company or one of its Subsidiaries.&#160; Whether entering military or other government service shall constitute Termination of Employment, or whether a Termination of Employment shall occur as a result of Disability, shall be determined in each case by the Board in its sole discretion.&#160; In the case of a Member of the Board or consultant who is not an employee of the Company or a Subsidiary, Termination of Employment shall mean voluntary or involuntary termination of Board service or the consulting relationship, as the case may be, for any reason.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;III</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ADMINISTRATION</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">3.01 Administration.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Plan shall be administered by the Board, except (i)&nbsp;awards to Non-Employee Directors under Section&nbsp;6.01(b)&nbsp;shall be automatic and granted under the terms set forth for Non-Employee Directors under the Plan without power or authority of the Board (or if applicable a committee) to alter or amend the number, terms or conditions of such awards and (ii)&nbsp;awards intended to qualify as exempt from the limitations on deductible compensation imposed by Section&nbsp;162(m)&nbsp;of the Code shall be granted and administered by a committee appointed by the Board consisting of no fewer than two members of the Board who meet each and all requirements to serve as outside directors within the meaning of Section&nbsp;162(m)&nbsp;of the Code and the regulations promulgated thereunder (the &#147;162(m)&nbsp;Committee&#148;).&#160; Except to the extent of matters reserved for the 162(m)&nbsp;Committee, the Board (or its designee, as described below) shall have exclusive and final authority in each determination, interpretation or other action affecting the Plan and its Participants.&#160; The Board (or its designee, as described below) shall have the sole discretionary authority to interpret the Plan, to establish and modify administrative rules&nbsp;for the Plan, to impose such conditions and restrictions on Awards as it determines appropriate, and to take such steps in connection with the Plan and Awards granted hereunder as it may deem necessary or advisable.&#160; The Board may, subject to compliance with applicable legal requirements, delegate to a person or a committee, none of whom need be</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_5_073643_3020"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=923107,FOLIO='5',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">members of the Board of the Company, such of its powers and authority under the Plan as it deems appropriate.&#160; The Board may appoint such person or committee to exercise any of the authority conferred upon the Board hereunder and, if a person or committee is designated to so serve, the term &#147;Board&#148; as used in this Plan shall include such committee.&#160; In the event of any such delegation of authority or exercise of authority by a person or committee so designated, references in the Plan to the Board shall be deemed to refer to the delegate of the Board or such committee, as the case may be.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;IV</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">SHARES</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">4.01 Number of Shares Issuable.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The total number of shares authorized to be issued under the Plan shall be the initial reserve of 18,500,000 shares of Common Stock, plus such amounts as may have been added to such reserve under this Section&nbsp;4.01, as in effect prior to May&nbsp;12, 2005, for a total of 33,173,367 shares as of such date.&#160; The number of shares available for issuance under the Plan shall be subject to adjustment in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.07.&#160; The shares to be offered under the Plan shall be authorized and unissued shares of Common Stock, or issued shares of Common Stock that will have been reacquired by the Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">4.02 Shares Subject to Terminated Awards.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Shares of Common Stock covered by any unexercised portions of terminated Options (including canceled Options) granted under Article&nbsp;VI, shares of Common Stock forfeited as provided in Section&nbsp;7.02(a)&nbsp;and shares of Common Stock subject to any Award that are otherwise surrendered or forfeited by a Participant may be subject to new Awards under the Plan.&#160; Shares of Common Stock subject to Options, or portions thereof, that have been surrendered in connection with the exercise of Stock Appreciation Rights shall not be available for subsequent Awards under the Plan, but shares of Common Stock issued in payment of such Stock Appreciation Rights shall not be charged against the number of shares of Common Stock available for the grant of Awards hereunder.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;V</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PARTICIPATION</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Participants in the Plan shall be such employees, directors and consultants of the Company and its Subsidiaries as the Board, in its sole discretion, may designate from time to time.&#160; The Board&#146;s designation of a Participant in any year shall not require the Board to designate such person to receive Awards in any other year.&#160; The designation of a Participant to receive an Award under one portion of the Plan does not require the Board to include such Participant under other portions of the Plan.&#160; The Board shall consider such factors as it deems pertinent in selecting Participants and in determining the types and amounts of their respective Awards.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_6_073705_7748"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=6,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=383354,FOLIO='6',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VI</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">STOCK OPTIONS AND STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">6.01 Option Awards.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Grant of Options.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board may grant, to such Participants as the Board may select, Options entitling the Participants to purchase shares of Common Stock from the Company in such numbers, at such prices, and on such terms and subject to such conditions, not inconsistent with the terms of the Plan, as may be established by the Board.&#160; The terms of any Option granted under the Plan shall be set forth in an Award Agreement. No Participant may be granted an Option to purchase more than 1,250,000 shares of Common Stock in any fiscal year of the Company, except that in his or her initial year of service, a Participant may be granted an Option to purchase up to 1,250,000 shares of Common Stock.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Non-Employee Director Options.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(i)&nbsp;Initial Grants.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; When a member of the Board of Directors first becomes a Non-Employee Director, he or she shall automatically be granted a Non-Qualified Option to purchase up to 40,000 shares of Common Stock as of the date he or she first becomes a Non-Employee Director.&#160; Each such option shall be evidenced by a written Award Agreement that shall set forth the following terms:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The per share Purchase Price shall be equal to the Fair Market Value of a share of Common Stock on the date of grant, unless then Board determines otherwise in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.01(c);</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Option shall expire on the 10</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;anniversary of the date of grant;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(3)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Option shall be fully vested on the 181</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">st</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day after the date of grant; and</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(4)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Option shall be exercisable in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.04 of this Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.75in;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(ii)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Nothing set forth in this section shall prevent the Board from considering Non-Employee Directors for other awards under this Plan and from making any Awards to Non-Employee Directors.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Purchase Price of Options.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;6.01(e)&nbsp;with respect to certain Incentive Stock Options, the Purchase Price of each share of Common Stock which may be purchased upon exercise of any Option granted under the Plan shall be determined by the Board; <i>provided, however,</i> that the Purchase Price shall in all cases be equal to or greater than the Fair Market Value on the Date of Grant.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_7_073729_141"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=7,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=417777,FOLIO='7',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Designation of Options.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Except as otherwise expressly provided in the Plan, the Board may designate, at the time of the grant of an Option, such Option as an Incentive Stock Option or a Non-Qualified Stock Option; <i>provided, however,</i> that an Option may be designated as an Incentive Stock Option only if the applicable Participant is an employee of the Company or a Subsidiary on the Date of Grant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;Special Incentive Stock Option Rules.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; No Participant may be granted Incentive Stock Options under the Plan (or any other plans of the Company and its Subsidiaries) that would result in Incentive Stock Options to purchase shares of Common Stock with an aggregate Fair Market Value (measured on the Date of Grant) of more than $100,000 first becoming exercisable by such Participant in any one calendar year.&#160; Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan to the contrary, no Incentive Stock Option shall be granted to any person who, at the time the Option is granted, owns stock (including stock owned by application of the constructive ownership rules&nbsp;in Section&nbsp;424(d)&nbsp;of the Code) possessing more than 10% of the total combined voting power of all classes of stock of the Company or any Subsidiary, unless at the time the Incentive Stock Option is granted the Option price is at least 110% of the Fair Market Value of the Common Stock subject to the Incentive Stock Option and the Incentive Stock Option by its terms is not exercisable for more than five (5)&nbsp;years from the Date of Grant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(f)&nbsp;Rights as a Shareholder.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; A Participant or a transferee of an Option pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.04 shall have no rights as a shareholder with respect to the shares of Common Stock covered by an Option until that Participant or transferee shall have become the holder of record of any such shares, and no adjustment shall be made with respect to any such shares of Common Stock for dividends in cash or other property or distributions of other rights on the Common Stock for which the record date is prior to the date on which that Participant or transferee shall have become the holder of record of any shares covered by such Option; <i>provided, however,</i> that Participants are entitled to share adjustments to reflect capital changes under Section&nbsp;9.07.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">6.02 Stock Appreciation Rights.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Stock Appreciation Right Awards.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board is authorized to grant to any Participant one or more Stock Appreciation Rights.&#160; Such Stock Appreciation Rights may be granted either independent of or in tandem with Options granted to the same Participant.&#160; Stock Appreciation Rights granted in tandem with Options may be granted simultaneously with, or, in the case of Non-Qualified Stock Options, subsequent to, the grant to such Participant of the related Options; <i>provided, however,</i> that:&#160; (i)&nbsp;any Option covering any share of Common Stock shall expire and not be exercisable upon the exercise of any Stock Appreciation Right with respect to the same share, (ii)&nbsp;any Stock Appreciation Right covering any share of Common Stock shall expire and not be exercisable upon the exercise of any Option with respect to the same share, and (iii)&nbsp;an Option and a Stock Appreciation Right covering the same share of Common Stock may not be exercised simultaneously.&#160; Upon exercise of a Stock Appreciation Right with respect to a share of Common Stock, the Participant shall be entitled to receive an amount equal to the excess, if any, of (A)&nbsp;the Fair Market Value of a share of Common Stock on the date of exercise over (B)&nbsp;the Exercise Price of such Stock Appreciation Right established in the Award Agreement, which amount shall be payable as provided in Section&nbsp;6.02(c).</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_8_073800_7608"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=8,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=601114,FOLIO='8',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Exercise Price.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Exercise Price established for any Stock Appreciation Right granted under this Plan shall be determined by the Board, but in the case of Stock Appreciation Rights granted in tandem with Options shall not be less than the Purchase Price of the related Options.&#160; Upon exercise of Stock Appreciation Rights, the number of shares issuable upon exercise under any related Options shall automatically be reduced by the number of shares of Common Stock represented by such Options which are surrendered as a result of the exercise of such Stock Appreciation Rights.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Payment of Incremental Value.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Any payment that may become due from the Company by reason of a Participant&#146;s exercise of a Stock Appreciation Right may be paid to the Participant as determined by the Board (i)&nbsp;all in cash, (ii)&nbsp;all in Common Stock, or (iii)&nbsp;in any combination of cash and Common Stock.&#160; In the event that all or a portion of the payment is to be made in Common Stock, the number of shares of Common Stock to be delivered in satisfaction of such payment shall be determined by dividing the amount of such payment or portion thereof by the Fair Market Value on the date of exercise.&#160; No fractional share of Common Stock shall be issued to make any payment in respect of Stock Appreciation Rights; if any fractional share would otherwise be issuable, the combination of cash and Common Stock payable to a Participant shall be adjusted as directed by the Board to avoid the issuance of any fractional share.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">6.03 Terms of Stock Options and Stock Appreciation Rights.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Conditions on Exercise.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; An Award Agreement with respect to Options and/or Stock Appreciation Rights may contain such waiting periods, exercise dates and restrictions on exercise (including, but not limited to, periodic installments) as may be determined by the Board at the time of grant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Duration of Options and Stock Appreciation Rights.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Options and Stock Appreciation Rights shall terminate after the first to occur of the following events:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.95pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp;Expiration of the Option or Stock Appreciation Right as provided in the related Award Agreement; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.95pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&nbsp;Termination of the Award as provided in Section&nbsp;6.03(e), following the applicable Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment; or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.95pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&nbsp;In the case of an Incentive Stock Option, ten years from the Date of Grant (five years in certain cases, as described in Section&nbsp;6.01(e)) Non-Qualified Stock Options may, if so approved by the Board, have a stated term in excess of ten years, but such Options shall in all events be subject to termination in accordance with clauses (i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;above); or</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:-37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.95pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&nbsp;Solely in the case of a Stock Appreciation Right granted in tandem with an Option, upon the expiration of the related Option.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Acceleration of Exercise Time.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board, in its sole discretion, shall have the right </font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_9_073850_8146"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
