<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(but shall not in any case be obligated), exercisable at any time after the Date of Grant, to permit the exercise of any Option or Stock Appreciation Right prior to the time such Option or Stock Appreciation Right would otherwise become exercisable under the terms of the related Award Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Extension of Exercise Time.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; In addition to the extensions permitted under Section&nbsp;6.03(e)&nbsp;in the event of Termination of Employment, the Board, in its sole discretion, shall have the right (but shall not in any case be obligated), exercisable on or at any time after the Date of Grant, to permit the exercise of any Option or Stock Appreciation Right after its expiration date described in Section&nbsp;6.03(e), subject, however, to the limitations described in Sections&nbsp;6.03(b)(i), (iii)&nbsp;and (iv).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;Exercise of Options or Stock Appreciation Rights Upon Termination of Employment.&#160; </font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unless an Optionee&#146;s Award Agreement provides otherwise, the following rules&nbsp;shall govern the treatment of Options and Stock Appreciation Rights upon Termination of Employment:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(i)&nbsp;Termination of Vested Options and Stock Appreciation Rights Upon Termination of Employment.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 71.25pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:37.05pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(A)&nbsp;Reasons Other Than Death, Disability or Retirement.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; In the event of a Participant&#146;s voluntary or involuntary Termination of Employment for any reason other than death, Disability or Retirement, the right of the Participant to exercise any Option or Stock Appreciation Right shall terminate on the date of such Termination of Employment, unless the exercise period is extended by the Board in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.03(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 71.25pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 71.25pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:37.05pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(B)&nbsp;Death, Disability or Retirement.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; In the event of a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment by reason of death, Disability or Retirement, the right of the Participant to exercise any Option or Stock Appreciation Right which he or she was entitled to exercise upon Termination of Employment (or which became exercisable pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.03(e)(ii)) shall, unless the exercise period is extended by the Board in accordance with Section&nbsp;6.03(d), terminate upon the earlier of (i)&nbsp;the later to occur of (A)&nbsp;first anniversary of the date of such Termination of Employment and (B)&nbsp;the first anniversary of the date of consummation of a public offering of the Common Stock and (ii)&nbsp;the date of expiration of the Option determined pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.03(b)(i), (iii)&nbsp;or (iv).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 71.25pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:37.05pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:1.0in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(ii)&nbsp;Termination of Unvested Options or Stock Appreciation Rights Upon Termination of Employment.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Subject to Section&nbsp;6.03(c), to the extent the right to exercise an Option or a Stock Appreciation Right, or any portion thereof, has not accrued as of the date of Termination of Employment, such right shall expire at the date of such Termination of Employment regardless of the reason for such Termination of Employment.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Board, in its sole discretion and under such terms as it deems appropriate, may permit, for a Participant who terminates employment by reason of Retirement and who will continue to render significant services to the Company or one of its Subsidiaries after his or her</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10<a name="26586-3-KS-01_PB_10_073918_7091"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=10,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=1023125,FOLIO='10',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-01_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 07:57 2015' -->

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Termination of Employment, the continued vesting of his or her Options and Stock Appreciation Rights during the period in which that individual continues to render such services.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">6.04 Exercise Procedures.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Each Option and Stock Appreciation Right granted under the Plan shall be exercised by written notice to the Company which must be received by the officer or employee of the Company designated in the Award Agreement at or before the close of business on the expiration date of the Award.&#160; The Purchase Price of shares purchased upon exercise of an Option granted under the Plan shall be paid in full in cash by the Participant pursuant to the Award Agreement; <i>provided, however,</i> that the Board may (but shall not be required to) permit payment to be made by delivery to the Company of either (a)&nbsp;shares of Common Stock held by the Participant for at least six months (which may include Restricted Shares, subject to such rules&nbsp;as the Board deems appropriate) or (b)&nbsp;any combination of cash and Common Stock or (c)&nbsp;such other consideration as the Board deems appropriate and in compliance with applicable law (including payment in accordance with a cashless exercise program under which, if so instructed by a Participant, shares of Common Stock may be issued directly to the Participant&#146;s broker or dealer upon receipt of an irrevocable written notice of exercise from the Participant).&#160; In the event that any shares of Common Stock shall be transferred to the Company to satisfy all or any part of the Purchase Price, the part of the Purchase Price deemed to have been satisfied by such transfer of shares of Common Stock shall be equal to the product derived by multiplying the Fair Market Value as of the date of exercise times the number of shares of Common Stock transferred to the Company.&#160; The Participant may not transfer to the Company in satisfaction of the Purchase Price any fractional share of Common Stock.&#160; Any part of the Purchase Price paid in cash upon the exercise of any Option shall be added to the general funds of the Company and may be used for any proper corporate purpose.&#160; Unless the Board shall otherwise determine, any shares of Common Stock transferred to the Company as payment of all or part of the Purchase Price upon the exercise of any Option shall be held as treasury shares.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">6.05 Change in Control.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Unless otherwise provided by the Board in the applicable Award Agreement, in the event of a Change in Control, all Options and Stock Appreciation Rights outstanding on the date of such Change in Control shall become immediately and fully exercisable.&#160; The provisions of this Section&nbsp;6.05 shall not be applicable to any Options or Stock Appreciation Rights granted to a Participant if any Change in Control results from such Participant&#146;s beneficial ownership (within the meaning of Rule&nbsp;13d-3 under the Exchange Act) of Company Voting Securities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VII</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RESTRICTED SHARES AND RESTRICTED STOCK UNITS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">7.01 Restricted Share Awards.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board may grant to any Participant an Award of such number of shares of Common Stock on such terms, conditions and restrictions, whether based on performance standards, periods of service, retention by the Participant of ownership of purchased or designated shares of Common Stock or other criteria, as the Board shall establish.</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The terms of any Restricted Share Award granted under this Plan shall be set forth in an Award</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_11_073328_5335"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=712364,FOLIO='11',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Agreement which shall contain provisions determined by the Board and not inconsistent with this Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Issuance of Restricted Shares.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; As soon as practicable after the Date of Grant of a Restricted Share Award by the Board, the Company shall cause to be transferred on the books of the Company or its agent, shares of Common Stock, registered on behalf of the Participant, evidencing the Restricted Shares covered by the Award, subject to forfeiture to the Company as of the Date of Grant if an Award Agreement with respect to the Restricted Shares covered by the Award is not duly executed by the Participant and timely returned to the Company.&#160; All shares of Common Stock covered by Restricted Share Awards under this Article&nbsp;VII shall be subject to the restrictions, terms and conditions contained in the Plan and the applicable Award Agreements entered into by the appropriate Participants.&#160; Until the lapse or release of all restrictions applicable to an Award of Restricted Shares the share certificates representing such Restricted Shares may be held in custody by the Company, its designee, or, if the certificates bear a restrictive legend, by the Participant.&#160; Upon the lapse or release of all restrictions with respect to an Award as described in Section&nbsp;7.01(d), one or more share certificates, registered in the name of the Participant, for an appropriate number of shares as provided in Section&nbsp;7.01(d), free of any restrictions set forth in the Plan and the related Award Agreement shall be delivered to the Participant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Shareholder Rights.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Beginning on the Date of Grant of a Restricted Share Award and subject to execution of the related Award Agreement as provided in Section&nbsp;7.01(a), and except as otherwise provided in such Award Agreement, the Participant shall become a shareholder of the Company with respect to all shares subject to the Award Agreement and shall have all of the rights of a shareholder, including, but not limited to, the right to vote such shares and the right to receive dividends; <i>provided, however,</i> that any shares of Common Stock distributed as a dividend or otherwise with respect to any Restricted Shares as to which the restrictions have not yet lapsed, shall be subject to the same restrictions as such Restricted Shares and held or restricted as provided in Section&nbsp;7.01(a).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Restriction on Transferability.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; None of the Restricted Shares may be assigned or transferred (other than by will or the laws of descent and distribution or to an <i>inter vivos</i> trust with respect to which the Participant is treated as the owner under Sections 671 through 677 of the Code), pledged or sold prior to the lapse of the restrictions applicable thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Delivery of Shares Upon Vesting.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Upon expiration or earlier termination of the forfeiture period without a forfeiture and the satisfaction of or release from any other conditions prescribed by the Board, or at such earlier time as provided under the provisions of Section&nbsp;7.03, the restrictions applicable to the Restricted Shares shall lapse.&#160; As promptly as administratively feasible thereafter, subject to the requirements of Section&nbsp;9.05, the Company shall deliver to the Participant or, in case of the Participant&#146;s death, to the Participant&#146;s Beneficiary, one or more share certificates for the appropriate number of shares of Common Stock, free of all such restrictions, except for any</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">restrictions that may be imposed by law.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_12_073420_5796"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=12,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=345257,FOLIO='12',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">7.02 Terms of Restricted Shares.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Forfeiture of Restricted Shares.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Subject to Sections 7.02(b)&nbsp;and 7.03, Restricted Shares shall be forfeited and returned to the Company and all rights of the Participant with respect to such Restricted Shares shall terminate unless the Participant continues in the service of the Company or a Subsidiary as an employee until the expiration of the forfeiture period for such Restricted Shares and satisfies any and all other conditions set forth in the Award Agreement.&#160; The Board shall determine the forfeiture period (which may, but need not, lapse in installments) and any other terms and conditions applicable with respect to any Restricted Share Award.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Waiver of Forfeiture Period.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Notwithstanding anything contained in this Article&nbsp;VII to the contrary, the Board may, in its sole discretion, waive the forfeiture period and any other conditions set forth in any Restricted Share Award Agreement under appropriate circumstances (including the death, Disability or Retirement of the Participant or a material change in circumstances arising after the date of an Award) and subject to such terms and conditions (including forfeiture of a proportionate number of the Restricted Shares) as the Board shall deem appropriate.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Repurchase Rights.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> The Board may, but shall not be required to, grant to Participants who promptly inform the Board of their intention to elect federal income taxation under Section&nbsp;83(b)&nbsp;of the Code, the right to require the Company to repurchase upon their termination of employment for any reason other than cause the shares for which federal income tax treatment under Section&nbsp;83(b)&nbsp;of the Code was elected.&#160; Such repurchase right, if granted, may be exercised by the Participant at any time after his or her termination of employment at a price to be determined by the Board at the date of grant but in no event greater than the fair market value of such shares at the time federal income tax treatment under Section&nbsp;83(b)&nbsp;of the Code was elected.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">7.03 Change in Control.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Unless otherwise provided by the Board in the applicable Award Agreement, in the event of a Change in Control, all restrictions applicable to the Restricted Share Award shall terminate fully and the Participant shall immediately have the right to the delivery of share certificates for such shares in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.01(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">7.04 Restricted Stock Unit Awards</font></i></b><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">.</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Restricted Stock Units</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Subject to the provisions of this Plan, the Board may grant Restricted Stock Units to a Participant.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Terms and Conditions</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; The Board shall determine the number of shares of Common Stock subject to each Restricted Stock Unit Award and the purchase price (if any) for each unit.&#160; Restricted Stock Units may be issued for no cash consideration, or such minimum consideration as may be required by applicable law.&#160; The Board may grant Restricted Stock Units on such other terms and with such conditions and restrictions the Board shall establish (including, without limitation, vesting and forfeiture</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provisions and conditions relating to applicable laws).&#160; The terms of any Restricted Stock</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_13_073540_2897"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=608285,FOLIO='13',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.7pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unit Award granted under this Plan shall be set forth in an Award Agreement which shall contain provisions determined by the Board and not inconsistent with this Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Acceleration of Vesting</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Notwithstanding anything contained in this Article&nbsp;VII to the contrary, the Board may, in its sole discretion, accelerate the vesting of Restricted Stock Units for conversion into shares of Common Stock under appropriate circumstances and subject to such terms and conditions, if any, as the Board shall deem appropriate.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Unfunded Obligation</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; A Restricted Stock Unit Award shall constitute an unfunded and unsecured obligation of the Company, and shall be settled in shares of Common Stock or cash, as determined by the Board at the time of grant or thereafter.&#160; Each unit shall represent the equivalent of one share of Common Stock.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;VIII</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PERFORMANCE AWARDS</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">8.01</font></i></b><b><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></i></b><b><i><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Performance Awards.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Award Periods and Calculations of Potential Incentive Amounts.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board may grant Performance Awards to Participants.&#160; A Performance Award shall consist of the right to receive a payment (measured by the Fair Market Value of a specified number of shares of Common Stock, increases in such Fair Market Value during the Award Period and/or a fixed cash amount) contingent upon the extent to which certain predetermined performance targets have been met during an Award Period.&#160; Performance Awards may be made in conjunction with, or in addition to, any other Awards made under this Plan.&#160; The Award Period shall be two or more fiscal or calendar years as determined by the Board.&#160; The Board, in its discretion and under such terms as it deems appropriate, may permit newly eligible employees, such as those who are promoted or newly hired, to receive Performance Awards after an Award Period has commenced.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Performance Targets.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The performance targets may include such goals related to the performance of the Company and/or the performance of a Participant as may be established by the Board in its discretion. The performance targets established by the Board may vary for different Award Periods and need not be the same for each Participant receiving a Performance Award in an Award Period. The Board, in its discretion, but only under extraordinary circumstances as determined by the Board, may change any prior determination of performance targets for any Award Period at any time prior to the final determination of the value of a related Performance Award when events or transactions occur to cause such performance targets to be an inappropriate measure of achievement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Earning Performance Awards.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board, on or as soon as practicable after the Date of Grant, shall prescribe a formula to determine the percentage of the applicable</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance Award to be earned based upon the degree of attainment of performance</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_14_073647_3020"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=14,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=792960,FOLIO='14',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.7pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">targets.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Payment of Earned Performance Awards.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Payments of earned Performance Awards shall be made in cash or shares of Common Stock or a combination of cash and shares of Common Stock, in the discretion of the Board.&#160; The Board, in its sole discretion, may provide such terms and conditions with respect to the payment of earned Performance Awards as it may deem desirable.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">8.02 Terms of Performance Awards.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Termination of Employment.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Unless otherwise provided below or in Section&nbsp;8.03, in the case of a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment prior to the end of an Award Period, the Participant will not have earned any Performance Awards for that Award Period.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Retirement.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; If a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment is because of Retirement prior to the end of an Award Period, the Participant will not be paid any Performance Award, unless the Board, in its sole and exclusive discretion, determines that an Award should be paid.&#160; In such a case, the Participant shall be entitled to receive a pro-rata portion of his or her Award as determined under subsection (d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Death or Disability.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; If a Participant&#146;s Termination of Employment is due to death or to Disability (as determined in the sole and exclusive discretion of the Board) prior to the end of an Award Period, the Participant or the Participant&#146;s personal representative shall be entitled to receive a pro-rata share of his or her Award as determined under subsection (d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(d)&nbsp;Pro-Rata Payment.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The amount of any payment to be made to a Participant whose employment is terminated by Retirement, death or Disability (under the circumstances described in subsections (b)&nbsp;and (c)) will be the amount determined by multiplying (i)&nbsp;the amount of the Performance Award that would have been earned through the end of the Award Period had such employment not been terminated by (ii)&nbsp;a fraction, the numerator of which is the number of whole months such Participant was employed during the Award Period, and the denominator of which is the total number of months of the Award Period.&#160; Any such payment made to a Participant whose employment is terminated prior to the end of an Award Period shall be made at the end of such Award Period, unless otherwise determined by the Board in its sole discretion.&#160; Any partial payment previously made or credited to a deferred account for the benefit of a Participant in accordance with Section&nbsp;8.01(d)&nbsp;of the Plan shall be subtracted from the amount otherwise determined as payable as provided in this Section&nbsp;8.02(d).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(e)&nbsp;Other Events.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Article&nbsp;VIII, the Board may, in its sole and exclusive discretion, determine to pay all or any portion of a Performance Award to a Participant who has terminated employment prior to the end of an Award Period under certain circumstances (including the death, Disability or</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Retirement of the Participant or a material change in circumstances arising after the Date</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_15_073740_7748"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=15,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=737480,FOLIO='15',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.7pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">of Grant), subject to such terms and conditions as the Board shall deem appropriate.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">8.03 Change in Control.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Unless otherwise provided by the Board in the applicable Award Agreement, in the event of a Change in Control, all Performance Awards for all Award Periods shall immediately become fully vested and payable to all Participants and shall be paid to Participants within 30 days after such Change in Control.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;IX</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">TERMS APPLICABLE TO ALL AWARDS GRANTED UNDER THE PLAN</font></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.01 Plan Provisions Control Award Terms.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The terms of the Plan shall govern all Awards granted under the Plan, and in no event shall the Board have the power to grant any Award under the Plan the terms of which are contrary to any of the provisions of the Plan.&#160; In the event any provision of any Award granted under the Plan shall conflict with any term in the Plan as constituted on the Date of Grant of such Award, the term in the Plan as constituted on the Date of Grant of such Award shall control.&#160; Except as provided in Section&nbsp;9.03 and Section&nbsp;9.07, the terms of any Award granted under the Plan may not be changed after the Date of Grant of such Award so as to materially decrease the value of the Award without the express written approval of the holder.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.02 Award Agreement.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; No person shall have any rights under any Award granted under the Plan unless and until the Company and the Participant to whom such Award shall have been granted shall have executed and delivered an Award Agreement or the Participant shall have received and acknowledged notice of the Award authorized by the Board expressly granting the Award to such person and containing provisions setting forth the terms of the Award.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.03 Modification of Award After Grant.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; No Award granted under the Plan to a Participant may be modified (unless such modification does not materially decrease the value of that Award) after its Date of Grant except by express written agreement between the Company and such Participant, provided that any such change (a)&nbsp;may not be inconsistent with the terms of the Plan, and (b)&nbsp;shall be approved by the Board.&#160; The right of the Board to amend an Award after its grant shall be subject to the following limitations: (A)&nbsp;the Board shall not authorize the amendment of any outstanding Option or Stock Appreciation Right to reduce the exercise price, (B)&nbsp;no Option or Stock Appreciation Right shall be canceled and replaced with an Award exercisable for Common Stock at a lower exercise price and (C)&nbsp;no Award shall be canceled in exchange for a cash payment from the Company to the Award owner, except in the event of a recapitalization, stock acquisition, merger, consolidation or other form of corporate transaction in which a company other than the Company is the surviving, continuing, successor or purchasing entity and in which the stockholders of the Company receive consideration that is all or predominantly cash in exchange for their shares of common stock in the transaction.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.04 Limitation on Transfer.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Except as provided in Section&nbsp;7.01(c)&nbsp;in the case of</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Restricted Shares, a Participant&#146;s rights and interest under the Plan may not be assigned or</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_16_073851_141"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=442919,FOLIO='16',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">transferred other than by will or the laws of descent and distribution and, during the lifetime of a Participant, only the Participant personally (or the Participant&#146;s personal representative) may exercise rights under the Plan.&#160; The Participant&#146;s Beneficiary may exercise the Participant&#146;s rights to the extent they are exercisable under the Plan following the death of the Participant.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Board may grant Non-Qualified Stock Options that are transferable, without payment of consideration, to such persons, including, but not limited to, immediate family members of the Participant or to trusts or partnerships for such family members, and the Board may also amend outstanding Non-Qualified Stock Options to provide for such transferability.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.05 Taxes.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Company shall be entitled, if the Board deems it necessary or desirable, to withhold (or secure payment from the Participant in lieu of withholding) the amount of any withholding or other tax required by law to be withheld or paid by the Company with respect to any amount payable and/or shares issuable under such Participant&#146;s Award or with respect to any income recognized upon a disqualifying disposition (i.e. a disposition prior to the expiration of the requisite holding periods) of shares received pursuant to the exercise of an Incentive Stock Option, and the Company may defer payment of cash or issuance of shares upon exercise or vesting of an Award unless indemnified to its satisfaction against any liability for any such tax.&#160; The amount of such withholding or tax payment shall be determined by the Board and shall be payable by the Participant in cash at such time as the Board determines; <i>provided, however,</i> that with the approval of the Board, the Participant may elect to meet his or her withholding requirement, in whole or in part, by having withheld from such Award at the appropriate time that number of shares of Common Stock, rounded up to the next whole share, the Fair Market Value of which is equal to the amount of withholding taxes due.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.06 Intentionally Omitted</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.07 Adjustments to Reflect Capital Changes.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Recapitalization.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The number and kind of shares subject to outstanding Awards, the Purchase Price or Exercise Price for such shares, the number and kind of shares available for Awards subsequently granted under the Plan and the maximum number of shares in respect of which Awards can be made to any Participant in any calendar year shall be appropriately adjusted to reflect any stock dividend, stock split, combination or exchange of shares, merger, consolidation or other change in capitalization with a similar substantive effect upon the Plan or the Awards granted under the Plan.&#160; The Board shall have the power and sole discretion to determine the amount of the adjustment to be made in each case.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Merger.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; After any Merger in which the Company is the surviving corporation, each Participant shall, at no additional cost, be entitled upon any exercise of an Option or receipt of any other Award to receive (subject to any required action by shareholders), in lieu of the number of shares of Common Stock receivable or exercisable pursuant to such Award prior to such Merger, the number and class of shares or other securities to which such Participant would have been entitled pursuant to the terms of the Merger if, at the time of the Merger, such Participant had been the holder of record of a</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_17_074000_7608"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=17,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=142118,FOLIO='17',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 36.7pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">number of shares of Common Stock equal to the number of shares of Common Stock receivable or exercisable pursuant to such Award.&#160; Comparable rights shall accrue to each Participant in the event of successive Mergers of the character described above.&#160; In the event of a Merger in which the Company is not the surviving corporation, the surviving, continuing, successor or purchasing corporation, as the case may be (the &#147;Acquiring Corporation&#148;), will either assume the Company&#146;s rights and obligations under outstanding Award Agreements or substitute awards in respect of the Acquiring Corporation&#146;s stock for outstanding Awards, <i>provided</i>, <i>however</i>, that if the Acquiring Corporation does not assume or substitute for such outstanding Awards, the Board shall provide prior to the Merger that any unexercisable and/or unvested portion of the outstanding Awards shall be immediately exercisable and vested as of a date prior to such Merger, as the Board so determines.&#160; The exercise and/or vesting of any Award that was permissible solely by reason of this Section&nbsp;9.07(b)&nbsp;shall be conditioned upon the consummation of the Merger.&#160; Any Options which are neither assumed by the Acquiring Corporation nor exercised as of the date of the Merger shall terminate effective as of the effective date of the Merger.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(c)&nbsp;Options to Purchase Shares or Stock of Acquired Companies.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; After any merger in which the Company or a Subsidiary shall be a surviving corporation, the Board may grant substituted options under the provisions of the Plan, pursuant to Section&nbsp;424 of the Code, replacing old options granted under a plan of another party to the merger whose shares of stock subject to the old options may no longer be issued following the merger.&#160; The manner of application of the foregoing provisions to such options and any appropriate adjustments shall be determined by the Board in its sole discretion.&#160; Any such adjustments may provide for the elimination of any fractional shares which might otherwise become subject to any Options.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.08 Certain Conditions on Awards.&#160; </font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Board may cancel any unexpired Awards at any time the Participant is not in compliance with any agreement between the Company and the Participant or any other legal obligation of the Participant relating to non-competition, confidentiality or proprietary interests and failure to comply with such agreements or obligations prior to, or during the twelve (12) months after, any exercise of an Option or Stock Appreciation Right shall result in the rescission of the exercise and the difference between the Fair Market Value on the date of exercise of the subject shares of Common Stock and the Purchase Price or Exercise Price, as the case may be, shall be returned to the Company by the Participant in cash within ten (10)&nbsp;days after notice of the rescission has been given to the Participant by the Company.&#160; Such notice may be given at any time within two years of the date of exercise.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.10 No Right to Employment.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; No employee or other person shall have any claim of right to be granted an Award under the Plan.&#160; Neither the Plan nor any action taken hereunder shall be construed as giving any employee any right to be retained in the employ of the Company or any of its Subsidiaries.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.11 Awards Not Includable for Benefit Purposes.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; Payments received by a Participant</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">  </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">pursuant to the provisions of the Plan shall not be included in the determination of benefits under</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_18_074107_8146"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=18,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="4",CHK=776643,FOLIO='18',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-KS-03_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 15:45 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">any pension, group insurance or other benefit plan applicable to the Participant which is maintained by the Company or any of its Subsidiaries, except as may be provided under the terms of such plans or determined by the Board.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.12 Governing Law.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; All determinations made and actions taken pursuant to the Plan shall be governed by the internal laws of the State of Delaware, except for its principles of conflict of laws, and construed in accordance therewith.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.13 No Strict Construction.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; No rule&nbsp;of strict construction shall be implied against the Company, the Board or any other person in the interpretation of any of the terms of the Plan, any Award granted under the Plan or any rule&nbsp;or procedure established by the Board.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.14 Captions.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The captions (i.e., all Section&nbsp;headings) used in the Plan are for convenience only, do not constitute a part of the Plan, and shall not be deemed to limit, characterize or affect in any way any provisions of the Plan, and all provisions of the Plan shall be construed as if no captions had been used in the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.15 Severability.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> &#160;Whenever possible, each provision in the Plan and every Award at any time granted under the Plan shall be interpreted in such manner as to be effective and valid under applicable law, but if any provision of the Plan or any Award at any time granted under the Plan shall be held to be prohibited by or invalid under applicable law, then (a)&nbsp;such provision shall be deemed amended to accomplish the objectives of the provision as originally written to the fullest extent permitted by law and (b)&nbsp;all other provisions of the Plan, such Award and every other Award at any time granted under the Plan shall remain in full force and effect.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:.5in;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">9.16 Amendment and Termination.</font></i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(a)&nbsp;Amendment.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Board shall have complete power and authority to amend the Plan at any time. &#160;No termination or amendment of the Plan may, without the consent of the Participant to whom any Award shall theretofore have been granted under the Plan, materially adversely affect the right of such individual under such Award.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 37.05pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-indent:34.2pt;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">(b)&nbsp;Termination.</font></i></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160; The Plan was terminated effective May&nbsp;1, 2012 and no Award shall be granted under the Plan after the termination of the Plan, but the termination of the Plan shall not have any other effect and any Award outstanding at the time of the termination of the Plan may be exercised after termination of the Plan at any time prior to the expiration date of such Award to the same extent such Award would have been exercisable had the Plan not been terminated.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19<a name="26586-3-KS-03_PB_19_074222_7091"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
