<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=32,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=591690,FOLIO='A-29',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">agrees that it will not store combustible or flammable materials on the Leased Premises except in accordance with applicable Environmental Laws.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Without the prior written consent of Landlord, which may be given or withheld in Landlord&#146;s sole discretion, Tenant shall not perform any <b>voluntary </b>environmental testing, including, but not limited to, boring or subsurface penetration, for Hazardous Materials in, on or about the Leased Premises unless required under the Environmental Laws.&nbsp; In the event that Tenant violates the foregoing covenant, Tenant shall within ten (10)&nbsp;days after written demand by Landlord to Tenant provide a replacement environmental insurance policy in a form and substance substantially similar to the Environmental Insurance Policy issued by an insurer which satisfies the requirements set forth in <u>Paragraph 14</u> hereof and is otherwise reasonably satisfactory to Landlord and Lender.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The obligations of Tenant under this <u>Paragraph 26</u> shall survive any termination of the Lease.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Entry by Landlord</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Landlord and its authorized representatives shall have the right upon reasonable notice (which shall be not less than two (2)&nbsp;Business Days except in the case of Emergency to enter the Leased Premises at all reasonable business hours (and at all other times in the event of an Emergency):&#160; (a)&nbsp;for the purpose of inspecting the same or for the purpose of doing any work under <u>Paragraph&nbsp;11(c)</u>, and may take all such action thereon as may be reasonably necessary for any such purpose (but nothing contained in this Lease or otherwise shall create or imply any duty upon the part of Landlord to make any such inspection or do any such work), and (b)&nbsp;for the purpose of showing the Leased Premises to prospective purchasers and mortgagees and, at any time within twelve (12) months prior to the expiration of the Term of this Lease for the purpose of showing the same to prospective tenants.&#160; No such entry shall constitute an eviction of Tenant but any such entry shall be done by Landlord in such reasonable manner as to minimize any disruption of Tenant&#146;s business operation.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">No Usury</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; The intention of the parties being to conform strictly to the applicable usury Laws, whenever any provision herein provides for payment by Tenant to Landlord of interest at a rate in excess of the legal rate permitted to be charged, such rate herein provided to be paid shall be deemed reduced to such legal rate.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">29.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Financial Statements and Additional Financial Covenants</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">So long as Tenant is a publicly listed company and is required to file quarterly and annual statements with the SEC, then Tenant shall have no financial reporting requirements hereunder.&#160; If Tenant becomes a privately held company then Tenant shall submit to Landlord, either in print or in electronic form, the following financial statements, all of which must be prepared in accordance with GAAP, consistently applied: (i)&nbsp;quarterly financial statements for Tenant, within forty-five (45) days after the end of each March, June, September&nbsp;and December&nbsp;during the Term, and (ii)&nbsp;annual financial statements for Tenant, audited by an independent certified public accountant, within one hundred twenty (120) days after the end of each fiscal year during the Term..&#160; Tenant permits Landlord to share any financial information described herein, with Lender and any institutional lenders and future investors in the Leased Premises (other than any of Tenant&#146;s competitors or Persons engaged in the same or substantially</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-30<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_30_083427_2897"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=33,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=227794,FOLIO='A-30',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the same business as Tenant), or as otherwise required by Legal Requirements, provided, however, that all such Persons shall first agree in writing to (i)&nbsp;utilize such information solely for the purpose of evaluating whether to make a loan to or investment in Landlord or to purchase the Leased Premises, and (ii)&nbsp;maintain the confidentiality of any material non-public information in accordance with the SEC&#146;s Regulation FD (as the same may be amended, supplemented or superseded from time to time) as long as such regulation is applicable to Tenant, and if such regulation is no longer applicable such Persons shall agree to maintain the confidentiality of any material non-public information using substantially the same procedures and diligence as such Person utilizes to maintain the confidentiality of its own material non-public information.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant (i)&nbsp;covenants that the net proceeds from its sale of the Leased Premises to Landlord on the Commencement Date, after discharge of the mortgage on the Leased Premises and payment of other costs and expenses attributable to closing such sale, will or used as working capital in connection with the Tenant&#146;s business of design, manufacture, sale and service of semiconductor manufacturing equipment, and (ii)&nbsp;represents, warrants, that upon the Commencement Date that Tenant shall have a Tangible Net Worth equal to or exceeding $50,000,000.00.&#160; Tenant covenants to maintain the Tangible Net Worth of at least $50,000,000.00 from the Commencement Date through the eighth (8</font><font size="1" style="font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">) anniversary of the Commencement Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Special Tax Indemnity</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant hereby represents, warrants and covenants to Landlord as follows: (i)&nbsp;Tenant believes that at the end of the Lease Term there will probably be potential lessees or buyers for the Leased Premises, (other than the Tenant or its Affiliates)&#160; as contemplated by current U.S. income tax law, as embodied in Revenue Procedure 76-30, 1976 C.B. 647, as modified and superseded by Revenue Procedure 2001-28, 2001&nbsp;C.B.&nbsp;1156 and accordingly, the Tenant believes that neither the Leased Premises as a whole nor the Equipment constitutes &#147;limited use property&#148; within the meaning of those provisions; (ii)&nbsp;the Tenant is not a &#147;tax exempt entity&#148; under current law as defined in Section&nbsp;168(h)&nbsp;of the Code; (iii)&nbsp;except to the extent required by Legal Requirements, neither Tenant nor any Affiliate will claim any depreciation or cost recovery deductions with respect to the Leased Premises or any portion thereof, and has taken or will take any other action in connection with filing its or their federal income tax returns that would be a primary factor resulting in a Loss or Inclusion (in each case, as defined in <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30(b)</u>&nbsp;below); and (iv)&nbsp;as of the date hereof none of the Improvements,&nbsp;the Equipment&#160; and the Leased Premises require any improvement, modification or addition in order to be rendered substantially complete for their intended use by Tenant, except for repairs and maintenance required in the ordinary course of Tenant&#146;s business, if any.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, by reason of the inaccuracy or breach by Tenant of any of the representations, warranties and covenants contained in this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30</u>, any anticipated depreciation deductions are lost, disallowed, eliminated, reduced, recaptured, compromised, delayed or otherwise made unavailable to Landlord (a &#147;<u>Loss</u>&#148;) or Landlord incurs a tax detriment because Landlord is required to include amounts in income other than Anticipated Lease Income (an &#147;<u>Inclusion</u>&#148;), Tenant shall, upon notice from Landlord promptly pay such Person designated by Landlord on demand in immediately available funds, as an indemnity an amount which, on an After-Tax Basis, shall be equal to the sum of (x)&nbsp;the increase in federal, state, local and foreign</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-31<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_31_083445_3020"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=34,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=284663,FOLIO='A-31',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">income tax liability for the respective taxable year attributable to such Loss or Inclusion <u>plus</u> (y)&nbsp;the amounts of interest, penalties and additions to tax (including, without limitation, any additions to tax because of underpayment of estimated tax), which are assessed against Landlord for such taxable year by the Internal Revenue Service or any relevant state, local or foreign taxing authority and which are attributable to such Loss or Inclusion.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord shall notify Tenant in writing of any actual or proposed claim, adjustment or other action of any tax authority received by Landlord in writing with respect to which Tenant may be required to provide indemnification under this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30</u> (&#147;<u>Proposed Adjustment</u>&#148;) (but failure of Landlord to so notify Tenant shall not relieve Tenant of its obligations hereunder except to the extent that Tenant is precluded from any contest and actually and materially harmed thereby).&#160; If Tenant shall request in writing within thirty (30) days after Landlord&#146;s notice described above that the Proposed Adjustment be contested (or such shorter period in which the Landlord may be required to take action), Landlord shall contest the Proposed Adjustment; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that: (i)&nbsp;prior to taking such action, Tenant shall have furnished Landlord with an opinion of independent tax advisor chosen by Tenant and reasonably acceptable to Landlord, to the effect that Landlord has a reasonable possibility of success in contesting the claim; (ii)&nbsp;prior to taking such action, Tenant shall have (A)&nbsp;acknowledged its obligation to indemnify Landlord hereunder in the event Landlord does not prevail in such contest and (B)&nbsp;agreed to reimburse Landlord promptly on demand for (or, if so requested by Landlord, advance), all costs and expenses that Landlord may incur in connection with contesting such claim, including without limitation reasonable attorneys&#146; and accountants&#146; fees and expenses; (iii)&nbsp;no Event of Default shall exist and be continuing; (iv)&nbsp;Landlord shall not be obligated to contest any proposed amount that is less than Twenty-Five Thousand and 00/100 Dollars ($25,000.00); and (v)&nbsp;Landlord shall in all events control the contest, and Tenant shall not have any right to inspect the books and records of Landlord, but shall have reasonable opportunity to review and comment on portions of documentation, protests, memoranda or briefs relating exclusively to a Proposed Adjustment.&#160; In the event Landlord pays the tax claimed and then seeks a refund, Landlord may require Tenant to advance funds sufficient to pay the tax that would be indemnified by Tenant hereunder if the refund claim were resolved adversely to Landlord.&#160; To the extent the refund claim is successful, the refund received from the taxing authority and attributable to funds advanced by Tenant shall be refunded to Tenant, unless the refund is needed to pay an indemnity.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30(c)</u>, Landlord may at any time decline to take any further action with respect to a Proposed Adjustment or may settle any contest without the consent of Tenant; provided, however, that if Tenant has complied with all the terms of this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30(c)</u>, and Tenant has reasonably withheld in writing its consent to all or part of such assessment or settlement based upon its evaluation of the merits, Tenant will not be obligated to indemnify Landlord for the portion of such assessment or settlement to which Tenant has reasonably withheld its consent.&#160; For the purposes of <u>Paragraphs 30</u> and <u>31</u>, &#147;Landlord&#148; shall include Landlord&#146;s successor and assigns and, in the case of any flow-through entity, the member or other equity owners of Landlord required to report the gross or net income of Landlord and/or other items of income, expense, deduction and credit with respect thereto, and &#147;Landlord&#148; and the owners thereof shall include the consolidated group of which any such Person is a part for income tax purposes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, the provisions of this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30</u> shall survive the earlier termination of this Lease.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-32<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_32_083508_7748"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=35,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=367173,FOLIO='A-32',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">31.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Withholdings</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, Tenant agrees that each payment of Basic Rent and Additional Rent shall be free and clear of, and without deduction for any withholdings of any nature whatsoever unless required by Legal Requirements.&#160; If any deduction or withholding is required with respect to a payment of Basic Rent and/or Additional Rent by Tenant, Tenant shall pay an additional amount such that the net amount actually received by the Tax Indemnitee, after deduction or withholding, will be equal, on an After-Tax Basis, to all such amounts that would be received by the Tax Indemnitee if no such deduction or withholding had been required; provided, that the Tenant shall not be obligated to pay any additional amount pursuant to this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;31</u> if the requirement to make such payment is solely due to the failure of a Tax Indemnitee to comply with <u>Paragraph&nbsp;30(c)</u>&nbsp;to obtain relief or exemption from such withholding.&#160; If as a result of Landlord&#146;s assignment of its interest in this Lease to a person that is not a &#147;United States Person&#148; (within the meaning of Section&nbsp;7701(a)(30) of the Code), Tenant shall be obligated to withhold any United States federal income tax (and/or any foreign tax) required by Legal Requirements and the preceding two sentences shall not apply in respect of any such withholding properly made and remitted to the applicable taxing authority.&#160; In the event Landlord sells or assigns its interest in this Lease, in whole or in part, to a person that is not a United States Person, such person shall, on or before the intended effective date of such sale or assignment, furnish each of Landlord and Tenant with such certificates, documents or other evidence as shall be required by the Code or Treasury Regulations issued pursuant thereto to establish its exemption from United States federal withholding requirements, including a valid, duly completed original copy of Internal Revenue Service Form&nbsp;W-8BEN or W-8ECI or successor applicable form, properly and duly executed, certifying in each case that such person is entitled, at the time such form is supplied, to receive payments pursuant to the Lease without deduction or withholding of United States federal income taxes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.8pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, the provisions of this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;31</u> shall survive the earlier termination of this Lease.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Intentionally Omitted].</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">32.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">[</font></b><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Intentionally Omitted]</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Right of First Offer</font></u></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except in transactions consummated prior to the first (1st) anniversary of the Commencement Date, if at any time during the Term of this Lease, except during the continuance of an Event of Default or as set forth in <u>subsections (b)</u>&nbsp;and <u>(c)</u>&nbsp;below, Landlord desires to sell the Leased Premises, Landlord agrees to notify Tenant in writing of such desire (&#147;<u>ROFO Notice</u>&#148;) and the price (the &#147;<u>ROFO Price</u>&#148;) and other terms at which Landlord so desires to sell the Leased Premises (the &#147;<u>ROFO Terms</u>&#148;).&#160; Tenant shall advise Landlord within thirty (30) days after receiving such ROFO Notice if Tenant is interested in purchasing the Leased Premises for the ROFO Price and the ROFO Terms.&#160; If Tenant fails to respond within such time period and/or if Tenant responds that Tenant is not interested in purchasing the Leased Premises, then Tenant shall have no further right hereunder, subject to <u>clause (b)(ii)</u>&nbsp;below, to</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-33<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_33_083532_141"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=36,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=528657,FOLIO='A-33',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">purchase the Leased Premises under the terms set forth in the ROFO Notice.&#160; However, if Tenant notifies Landlord within such time period that Tenant wants to purchase the Leased Premises at the ROFO Price and upon such the ROFO Terms, then Landlord and Tenant shall have forty-five (45) days following Landlord&#146;s receipt of such notice from Tenant within which to negotiate and execute a mutually satisfactory agreement for the sale of the Leased Premises to Tenant.&#160; Tenant acknowledges and agrees that:&#160; (i)&nbsp;any such sale or conveyance during any period in which the Loan may not be prepaid or defeased, as the case may be, shall be subject to the outstanding balance of the Loan, and, if Tenant shall be entitled to, and shall, exercise its rights under this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;33</u>, the Loan, Note, Mortgage and other loan documents will be assumed by Tenant on a full recourse basis, and the Lien of the Mortgage may not be released during such period (which shall be duly accounted for in the ROFO Terms); (ii)&nbsp;such sale shall be in accordance with and subject to the terms and provisions of the Note, the Mortgage and the other loan documents, whether such purchase contemplates the purchase of the Leased Premises subject to the Lien of the Mortgage or for a release of the Lien of the Mortgage; and (iii)&nbsp;if the Lien of the Mortgage is not released in connection with such sale of the Leased Premises, and if Tenant acquires the Leased Premises, no merger of title shall occur and this Lease will remain in full force and effect in accordance with their terms.&#160; From the time of Tenant&#146;s exercise of its right to purchase the Leased Premises as aforesaid until the closing of the conveyance of the Leased Premises to Tenant, Tenant and Landlord shall continue to enjoy and be bound by all of their respective rights and obligations under this Lease, including the obligation of Tenant to pay Rent as required herein through the date of such conveyance.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&nbsp; In the event that Landlord and Tenant enter into an agreement of sale and purchase but transfer of the Leased Premises to Tenant is not consummated due to Tenant&#146;s default under such agreement of sale and purchase, then Tenant shall have no further right hereunder to purchase the Leased Premises and without waiving or modifying any claim due to Tenant&#146;s default under such agreement, this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;33</u> shall be void in its entirety and Tenant shall have no further rights and Landlord shall have no further obligations under this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;33</u>.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In the event that Landlord and Tenant fail to enter into an agreement of sale and purchase within such forty-five (45) days or the sale and purchase pursuant thereto is not consummated for reasons other than Tenant&#146;s default thereunder, then Tenant shall have no further right hereunder to purchase the Leased Premises with respect to such ROFO Notice, subject to the balance of this <u>clause (b)(ii)</u>.&#160; Thereafter, Landlord may negotiate with any third party for the sale and purchase of the Leased Premises; provided, however, that Landlord will not finally enter into an agreement of sale with any third party for a purchase price that is less than 95.0% of the ROFO Price, or on terms materially less favorable to Landlord than the ROFO Terms.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, the provisions of this <u>Paragraph&nbsp;33</u> shall not apply to (i)&nbsp;any sale or conveyance of the Leased Premises in foreclosure sale (or similar proceeding) of the Mortgage or a bona-fide mortgage or deed of trust or to any conveyance in lieu of foreclosure of the Mortgage or such bona-fide mortgage or deed of trust, or to any transfer subsequent to a foreclosure sale or deed in lieu thereof if the Loan is securitized, (ii)&nbsp;any sale or conveyance of the Leased Premises which occurs during the existence of an Event of Default hereunder or under the Loan Documents, (iii)&nbsp;a Taking or transfer by deed in lieu of</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-34<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_34_083719_7608"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=37,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=192718,FOLIO='A-34',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Taking, (iv)&nbsp;any transfer of the Leased Premises to an Affiliate of Landlord, (v)&nbsp;any transfer of the Leased Premises to a joint venture in which Landlord or its Affiliate holds a material interest and for which Landlord or its Affiliate serves as general partner, managing member or developer (pursuant to the terms of the joint venture agreement or a separate management or development agreement), (vi)&nbsp;a transfer in connection with a sale of all or substantially all of Landlord&#146;s assets, or (vii)&nbsp;any sale, conveyance, alienation, mortgage, encumbrance, pledge or transfer of the beneficial ownership interest, membership interest or other equity interest in Landlord, or the change of the trustee, manager or other controlling person of the Landlord.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">34.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Separability</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; To the maximum extent permitted by Legal Requirements, each and every covenant and agreement contained in this Lease is, and shall be construed to be, a separate and independent covenant and agreement, and the breach of any such covenant or agreement by Landlord shall not discharge or relieve Tenant from its obligation to perform the same.&#160; If any term or provision of this Lease or the application thereof to any provision of this Lease or the application thereof to any person or circumstances shall to any extent be invalid and unenforceable, the remainder of this Lease, or the application of such term or provision to person or circumstances other than those as to which it is invalid or unenforceable, shall, to the maximum extent permitted by Legal Requirements, including equitable principles, not be affected thereby, and each term and provision of this Lease shall be valid and shall be enforced to the extent permitted by law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Miscellaneous</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The paragraph headings in this Lease are used only for convenience in finding the subject matters and are not part of this Lease or to be used in determining the intent of the parties or otherwise interpreting this Lease.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As used in this Lease the singular shall include the plural as the context requires and the following words and phrases shall have the following meanings: (i)&nbsp;&#147;including&#148; shall mean &#147;including but not limited to&#148;; (ii)&nbsp;&#147;provisions&#148; shall mean &#147;provisions, terms, agreements, covenants and/or conditions&#148;; and (iii)&nbsp;&#147;obligation&#148; shall mean &#147;obligation, duty, agreement, liability, covenant or condition&#148;.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as expressly provided herein, any act which Landlord is permitted to perform under this Lease may be performed at any time and from time to time by Landlord or any person or entity designated by Landlord.&#160; Except as expressly provided herein, any act which Tenant is required to perform under this Lease shall be performed at Tenant&#146;s sole cost and expense.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Lease may be modified, amended, discharged or waived only with the written consent of Lender by an agreement in writing signed by the party against whom enforcement of any such modification, amendment, discharge or waiver is sought.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The covenants of this Lease shall run with the Land and bind Tenant, the successors and assigns of Tenant and all present and subsequent encumbrances and subtenants of any of the Leased Premises, and shall inure to the benefit of and bind Landlord, its successors and assigns.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-35<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_35_083748_8146"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[<u>Intentionally Omitted</u>.]</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Lease will be simultaneously executed in several counterparts, each of which when so executed and delivered shall constitute an original, fully enforceable counterpart for all purposes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Lease shall be governed by and construed according to the Laws of the State.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything contained herein to the contrary, each party to this Lease (and each of its employees, representatives and other agents) may disclose to any and all persons, without limitation of any kind, the tax treatment and tax structure of the Lease and all materials of any kind (including opinions and other tax analyses) that are provided to such party or parties relating to the tax treatment or tax structure of the Lease, except that such disclosure is not permitted to the extent necessary for each party to comply with the federal or state securities laws.&#160; This authorization is not intended to permit disclosure of any other information and materials relating to the Lease including, without limitation: (i)&nbsp;any portion of any materials to the extent not related to the tax treatment or tax structure of the Lease, (ii)&nbsp;the identities of participants or potential participants in the Lease, (iii)&nbsp;the existence or status of any negotiations, (iv)&nbsp;any pricing or financial information (except to the extent such pricing or financial information is related to the tax treatment or tax structure of the Lease), and (v)&nbsp;any other term or detail not relevant to the tax treatment or the tax structure of the Lease.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">36.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Specially Designated Nationals; Blocked Persons; Embargoed Persons</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant represents and warrants to Landlord that (A)&nbsp;Tenant is (i)&nbsp;not currently identified on the Specially Designated Nationals and Blocked Persons List maintained by the Office of Foreign Assets Control of the Department of the Treasury (&#147;<u>OFAC</u>&#148;) and/or on any other similar list maintained by OFAC pursuant to any authorizing statute, executive order or regulation (collectively, the &#147;<u>List</u>&#148;), and (ii)&nbsp;not an entity with whom a citizen of the United States is prohibited to engage in transactions by any trade embargo, economic sanction, or other prohibition of United States law, regulation, or Executive Order of the President of the United States, (B)&nbsp;none of the funds or other assets of Tenant (for the avoidance of doubt, other than publicly traded stock) constitute property of, or are beneficially owned, directly or indirectly, by, any Embargoed Person (C)&nbsp;other than proceeds of any publicly traded stock, none of the funds of Tenant have been derived from any unlawful activity with the result that the investment in Tenant is prohibited by law or that the Lease is in violation of law, and (D)&nbsp;Tenant has implemented procedures, and will apply those procedures, to ensure its compliance with OFAC.&#160; The term &#147;Embargoed Person&#148; means any person, entity or government subject to trade restrictions under U.S. law, including but not limited to, the International Emergency Economic Powers Act, 50&nbsp;U.S.C. &#167;1701 et seq., The Trading with the Enemy Act, 50 U.S.C. App.&nbsp;1 et seq., and any Executive Orders or regulations promulgated thereunder with the result that the investment in Tenant is prohibited by law or Tenant&#160; is in violation of law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant covenants and agrees (A)&nbsp;to comply with all requirements of law relating to money laundering, anti-terrorism, trade embargos and economic sanctions, now or hereafter in effect, (B)&nbsp;to promptly notify Landlord in writing if Tenant obtains any actual</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-36<a name="26586-3-LW-07_PB_36_083813_7091"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=39,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=919682,FOLIO='A-36',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-07_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 08:57 2015' -->

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">knowledge that any of the representations, warranties or covenants set forth in this paragraph or the preceding paragraph are no longer true or have been breached (C)&nbsp;except for proceeds of publicly traded stock, not to use funds from any &#147;Prohibited Person&#148; (as such term is defined in the September&nbsp;24, 2001 Executive Order Blocking Property and Prohibiting Transactions With Persons Who Commit, Threaten to Commit, or Support Terrorism) to make any payment due to Landlord under the Lease and (D)&nbsp;at the request of Landlord, to provide such non-confidential information as may be reasonably requested by Landlord to determine Tenant&#146;s compliance with the terms hereof.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant hereby acknowledges and agrees that Tenant&#146;s inclusion on the List, or finding by a court of competent jurisdiction that Tenant or any executive officer or Director of Tenant is an Embargoed Person or Prohibited Person at any time during the Term shall be an Event of Default (except no Event of Default shall arise in the event Tenant is removed from the List within ninety (90) days).&#160; Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, Tenant shall not knowingly permit the Premises or any portion thereof to be used or occupied by any person or entity on the List or by any Embargoed Person or Prohibited Person (on a permanent, temporary or transient basis).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Force Majeure</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Other than for Landlord&#146;s or Tenant&#146;s obligations under this Lease that can be performed by the payment of money (including, without limitation, Tenant&#146;s obligation to pay Basic Rent and Additional Rent, this Lease and the obligations of Landlord and Tenant to perform their respective obligations hereunder shall be subject to Force Majeure.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A-37<a name="26586-3-LW-09_PB_37_084015_4141"></a></font></p>

<div>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">Note on Omitted Exhibits and Schedules to the Lease Agreement dated as of January&nbsp;30, 2015 between Axcelis Technologies,&nbsp;Inc. and Beverly Property Owner, LLC <br> as filed with the Securities Exchange Commission (the &#147;Commission&#148;) on Form&nbsp;10-K</font></i></b></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:3.0pt;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">In accordance with Paragraph (b)(2)&nbsp;of the Instructions to Item 601 of Regulation S-K issued by the Commission, all of the exhibits to this Lease Agreement (other than Exhibit&nbsp;B &#151;Rent Schedule, Exhibit&nbsp;G &#151; Replacements and Appendix A &#151; Definitions) have not been filed on the basis that they do not contain information which is material to an investment decision and which is otherwise not disclosed in the agreement or the Form&nbsp;10-K to which the Lease Agreement is an exhibit) is an exhibit. Axcelis will furnish supplementally a copy of any omitted exhibit or schedule to the Commission upon request.&#160; Below is a list of the omitted exhibits and schedules with a brief description of the document:</font></i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT&nbsp;B</font></u></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">RENT SCHEDULE</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Basic Rent for the Term shall be payable as follows:(1)</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Basic Rent is due on each Basic Rent Payment Date.</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding anything in this Lease to the contrary, for the purposes of Paragraph 5(b), the Basic Rent during each Extension Term shall increase by 2.00% (Two and 00/100ths Percent) for each year of each Extension Term.</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXHIBIT&nbsp;G</font></u></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">REPLACEMENTS</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">A.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Replacements and Replacements Reserve</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Replacement Reserve Fund</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; Tenant shall pay to Landlord or Lender (a)&nbsp;on the Commencement Date an initial deposit $3,477.61 (the &#147;<u>Replacement Reserve Initial Deposit</u>&#148;) and (b)&nbsp;on each Basic Rent Payment Date thereafter $3,477.61 (the &#147;<u>Replacement Reserve Monthly Deposit</u>&#148;) which amounts are reasonably estimated by Landlord in its discretion to be due for replacements and repairs required to be made to the Leased Premises during the calendar year (collectively, the &#147;<u>Replacements</u>&#148;).&#160; Amounts so deposited shall hereinafter be referred to as Tenant&#146;s &#147;<u>Replacement Reserve Fund</u>&#148; and the account in which such amounts are held shall hereinafter be referred to as Tenant&#146;s &#147;<u>Replacement Reserve Account</u>&#148;.&#160; Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, the amount of Replacement Reserve Funds on deposit in the Replacement Reserve Account at any given time shall not exceed $125,193.90 in the aggregate (the &#147;<u>Replacement Reserve Cap</u>&#148;) and, accordingly, to the extent a Replacement Reserve Monthly Deposit would result in the aggregate amount of Replacement Reserve Funds in the Replacement Reserve Account to exceed the Replacement Reserve Cap, such Replacement Reserve Monthly Deposit shall be decreased by an amount equal to such excess.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.2</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Disbursements from Replacement Reserve Account</font></u><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">.&#160; (a)&nbsp; Landlord shall make disbursements from the Replacement Reserve Account to pay Tenant only for the costs of Replacements.&#160; Landlord shall not be obligated to make disbursements from the Replacement Reserve Account to reimburse Tenant for the costs of routine maintenance to the Leased Premises or replacements of Tenant&#146;s business inventory.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Landlord shall, upon written request from Tenant and satisfaction of the requirements set forth in this <u>Paragraph 1.2</u>, disburse to Tenant amounts from the Replacement Reserve Account necessary to pay for the actual approved costs of Replacements or to reimburse Tenant therefor, upon completion of such Replacements (or, upon partial completion in the case of Replacements made pursuant to <u>Paragraph 1.2(e)</u>&nbsp;hereof) as reasonably determined by Landlord.&#160; In no event shall Landlord be obligated to disburse funds from the Replacement Reserve Account if an Event of Default exists and is continuing.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Each request for disbursement from the Replacement Reserve Account shall specify (i)&nbsp;the Replacements for which the disbursement is requested, describing the same in reasonable detail, (ii)&nbsp;the quantity and price of each item purchased having a value in excess of Ten Thousand Dollars ($10,000.00), if the Replacement includes the purchase or replacement of specific items costing in excess of such amount, (iii)&nbsp;the price of all materials (grouped by type or category, as Tenant shall reasonably determine) used in any Replacement other than the purchase or replacement of specific items specified by Tenant pursuant to clause (ii)&nbsp;hereof, and (iv)&nbsp;the cost of all contracted construction and other labor or other services (such as, but not limited to, architectural, engineering, survey, geotechnical and other soft costs) applicable to each Replacement for which such request for disbursement is made.&#160; With each request Tenant shall certify or cause its project architect to certify that all Replacements have been made in accordance with all applicable Legal Requirements.&#160; Each request for disbursement shall include</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit G-1<a name="26586-3-LW-09_PB_1_085905_8715"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
</div>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=44,EFW="2223440",CP="AXCELIS TECHNOLOGIES, INC.",DN="10",CHK=12910,FOLIO='Exhibit G-1',FILE="DISK126:[14ZDH3.14ZDH18603]26586-3-LW-09_ZDH18603.CHC",USER="LPALLES",CD='Mar  5 09:12 2015' -->

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">copies of invoices for all items or materials purchased costing in excess or $10,000 and for all contracted labor or services provided and, unless Landlord has agreed to issue joint checks as described below in connection with a particular Replacement, each request shall include evidence reasonably satisfactory to Landlord of payment of all such amounts.&#160; Except as provided in <u>Paragraph 1.2(e)</u>&nbsp;hereof, each request for disbursement from the Replacement Reserve Account shall be made only after completion of the Replacement for which disbursement is requested.&#160; Tenant shall provide Landlord evidence of completion of the subject Replacement satisfactory to Landlord in its reasonable judgment.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Tenant shall pay all invoices in connection with the Replacements with respect to which a disbursement is requested prior to submitting such request for disbursement from the Replacement Reserve Account or, at the request of Tenant, Landlord shall issue joint checks, payable to Tenant and the contractor, supplier, materialman, mechanic, subcontractor or other party to whom payment is due in connection with a Replacement.&#160; In the case of payments made by joint check, Landlord may require a waiver of lien from each Person receiving payment prior to Landlord&#146;s disbursement from the Replacement Reserve Account (which waiver of lien may be conditioned on such Person&#146;s receipt of the applicable payment).&#160; In addition, as a condition to any disbursement, Landlord may require Tenant to obtain lien waivers from each contractor, supplier, materialman, mechanic or subcontractor who receives payment in an amount equal to or greater than $25,000.00 for completion of its work or delivery of its materials.&#160; Any lien waiver delivered hereunder shall conform to the requirements of applicable law and shall cover all work performed and materials supplied (including equipment and fixtures) for the Leased Premises by that contractor, supplier, subcontractor, mechanic or materialman through the date covered by the current reimbursement request (or, if payment to such contractor, supplier, subcontractor, mechanic or materialmen is to be made by a joint check, the release of lien shall be effective through the date covered by the previous release of funds request).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If (i)&nbsp;the cost of a Replacement exceeds $25,000.00, (ii)&nbsp;a contractor performing such Replacement or a portion thereof requires periodic payments pursuant to terms of a written contract, and (iii)&nbsp;Landlord has approved in writing in advance such periodic payments (such approval not to be unreasonably withheld, conditioned or delayed), a request for reimbursement from the Replacement Reserve Account may be made after completion of a portion of the work under such contract or other designated interval under such contract, provided (A)&nbsp;such contract requires payment upon completion of such portion of the work or upon such other designated interval, (B)&nbsp;the materials for which the request is made are on site at the Leased Premises and are properly secured or have been installed in the Leased Premises (or are stored off-site in a commercially reasonable manner and free and clear of mechanics&#146; Lien claims), (C)&nbsp;all other conditions in this Lease for the requested disbursement have been satisfied, (D)&nbsp;funds remaining in the Replacement Reserve Account are, in Landlord&#146;s reasonable judgment, sufficient to complete such Replacement, and (E)&nbsp;if required by Landlord&#146;s Lender, each contractor or subcontractor who is to receive payment in an amount equal to or greater than $25,000.00 for completion of its work or delivery of its materials and receiving payments under such contract shall provide a waiver of lien with respect to amounts which have been paid to that contractor or subcontractor.</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit G-2<a name="26586-3-LW-09_PB_2_085935_563"></a></font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>
